title: Fix deployment failure and enable successful redeploy

requirements.text: Identify the root cause of the current deployment/build failure and apply code/config changes required so the project builds and deploys successfully when retried.

quotes: Retry deployment and fix the error automatically

acceptanceCriteria: Running the standard build for the project completes successfully without errors.
Deploying the canisters succeeds on a retry after the fix (no manual code edits required between attempts).
The app loads successfully after deployment and core routes ('/', '/category/$categoryId', '/story/$storyId', '/search') render without runtime errors.

constraints: Keep all Motoko backend logic within the single actor in backend/main.mo (do not introduce additional backend services/canisters).

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features unrelated to fixing the deployment/build failure.
